org.treetank.api
Interface ISession

All Known Implementing Classes:
Session
public interface ISession

ISession

Description

Each IDatabase is bound to multiple instances implementing ISession. Transactions can then be started from this instance. There can only be one INodeWriteTrx at the time. However, multiple IReadTransactions can coexist concurrently.

Method Summary
 INodeReadTrx beginNodeReadTransaction()
          Begin a read-only transaction on the latest committed revision key.
 INodeReadTrx beginNodeReadTransaction(long pRev)
          Begin a read-only transaction on the given revision key.
 INodeWriteTrx beginNodeWriteTransaction()
          Begin exclusive read/write transaction .
 IPageReadTrx beginPageReadTransaction(long pRevKey)
          Begin exclusive read transaction on the page layer
 void close()
          Safely close session and immediately release all resources.

IPageReadTrx beginPageReadTransaction(long pRevKey)
                                      throws AbsTTException
Begin exclusive read transaction on the page layer

Parameters:

Returns:
a IPageReadTrx instance
Throws:
AbsTTException

close

void close()
           throws AbsTTException
Safely close session and immediately release all resources. If there are running transactions, they will automatically be closed. This is an idempotent operation and does nothing if the session is already closed.

Throws:
AbsTTException - If can't close session.
